name: John Goblin
description:
Brought to you by team Goblagool: John Goblin is a platformer where each level is set on a timer. If you don't complete the level in time, the fearsome juggergnaut Gnolan will come down and kill you. As the titular John Goblin, you must stay on your feet to dodge bombs, kill gnomes, and reach the end in time!

Members: Clancy and Owen

Programs used to make this game:

IDE: GameMaker Studio 2

Art: Aseprite, Photoshop

Music: Ableton

Sound: JSFXR, SoundEffectsFactory - https://www.youtube.com/user/SoundEffectsFactory

Additional Information:

The game saves your settings and progress.

A lot of content got cut for the jam's release, however we will update it beyond the game jam.

Thanks and good luck to everyone else!
